text: is a city in Miyazaki Prefecture, Japan."Nichinan," Kodansha Encyclopedia of Japan, Vol. 5, p. 375. ==History== Nichinan grew up around Obi Castle. The modern city was established in 1950. ==References== ==Other websites== * Nichinan City website * Japanese National Tourist Organization Category:Cities in Miyazaki Prefecture
title: Nichinan, Miyazaki
